title: netcdf-c@4.8.0: requires variant api=v18 when ^hdf5@1.12
body:
`netcdf-c@4.8.0` requires `api=v18` if using `^hdf5@1.12.0`

Using `spack@develop` (26c645650d5bfc4a10bdf4568149b3fa44ccbc44 from `Mon Jun 14 16:23:09 2021 -0400`):
* Container image: `ecpe4s/ubuntu20.04-runner-x86_64:2021-05-15`

Concrete spec: [netcdf-c-4tx24b.spec.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6651482/netcdf-c-4tx24b.spec.yaml.txt)
Full log: [netcdf-c-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6651513/netcdf-c-build-out.txt)


```
$> spack mirror add E4S https://cache.e4s.io
$> spack buildcache keys -it

$> spack install --cache-only --include-build-deps --only dependencies -f ./netcdf-c-4tx24b.spec.yaml
OK

$> spack install --no-cache -f ./netcdf-c-4tx24b.spec.yaml
...
==> Installing netcdf-c-4.8.0-ky36nhc5qerej3pb6b3fgxgqdvltk3mp
==> No binary for netcdf-c-4.8.0-ky36nhc5qerej3pb6b3fgxgqdvltk3mp found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/67/679635119a58165c79bb9736f7603e2c19792dd848f19195bf6881492246d6d5.tar.gz
==> No patches needed for netcdf-c
==> netcdf-c: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> netcdf-c: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-netcdf-c-4.8.0-ky36nhc5qerej3pb6b3fgxgqdvltk3mp/spack-src/configure' '--prefix=/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/netcdf-c-4.8.0-ky36nhc5qerej3pb6b3fgxgqdvltk3mp' '--enable-v2' '--enable-utilities' '--enable-static' '--enable-largefile' '--enable-netcdf-4' '--disable-fsync' '--enable-dynamic-loading' '--enable-shared' '--disable-dap' '--enable-parallel4' '--disable-jna' '--disable-pnetcdf' 'CC=/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/mpich-3.4.1-deg5namalzo3zlh2vz3nsh37oulefvwq/bin/mpicc' '--disable-hdf4' 'CFLAGS=-fPIC' 'CPPFLAGS=-I/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/hdf5-1.12.0-c3mcibvcfcf6qgmv6rlmhquxn3uy47rh/include' 'LDFLAGS=-L/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/hdf5-1.12.0-c3mcibvcfcf6qgmv6rlmhquxn3uy47rh/lib' 'LIBS='

1 error found in build log:
     324    checking for H5free_memory... yes
     325    checking for H5resize_memory... yes
     326    checking for H5allocate_memory... yes
     327    checking for H5Pset_all_coll_metadata_ops... yes
     328    checking for H5Literate... no
     329    checking for H5Literate macro... no
  >> 330    configure: error: HDF5 was not built with API compatibility version v18. Please recompile your libhdf5 install using '--with-defaul
            t-api-version=v18'.

See build log for details:
  /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-netcdf-c-4.8.0-ky36nhc5qerej3pb6b3fgxgqdvltk3mp/spack-build-out.txt
```

I'm happy to submit a PR for this but wanted to note it here in case anyone has an opinion on the best way to express this.

@skosukhin @WardF @gsjaardema
